input.sentences: i went on an amazing hike today .
i found a small cave to crawl into .
the highlight was this amazing waterfall .
at the end of the hike i sat down and enjoyed this beautiful river . i ca n't wait to do this again .
output.sentences: On a hike, I had the most amazing day.
I found a way to crawl through a tight entrance cave.
There was a waterfall in there, and you can say this highlight was amazing!
I had to wait for my ride home, so I sat on the bank of the river watching the beautiful nature.
